event: admitted to the gynecological emergency unit
30-centimeter mass of the left broad ligament
uterus and right adnexa were normal
moderately abundant non-purulent serosanginous peritoneal fluid
antibacterial treatment with piperacillin/tazobactam and gentamicin
transferred to the intensive care unit
microbiological analysis of the peritoneal fluid
Garderella vaginalis susceptible to penicillin G
Atopobium vaginae susceptible to all tested antibacterials
caused by Gardnerella vaginalis and Atopobium vaginae
discharged from the intensive care unit
